name: Extreme Riding 2
description:
Extreme Riding 2 is a continuation of the exciting first part of the game, where new cars and levels await you! Even more fun and madness awaits you in the second part of the game! Your main task is to test your driving skills in different cars on exciting tracks! Choose your favorite car from those offered and hit the track! Go through unusual obstacles, jump over cliffs, maneuver, and get to the finish line within a certain time! Complete all the tracks and show everyone that you are the best!

Game Features:
- Different difficulty levels
- Several cars
- Beautiful graphics
- Great soundtrack
